name: Waling-waling 1
description:
First of a series of flower mandalas, moving in various manners and directions. The flowers are hand-drawn then made alive digitally.

This flower in particular is called Waling-waling. Hailed as the "Queen of Philippine Orchids" it is one of the largest species of orchid in the world. Endemic to the Philippines and currently critically endangered, it is now considered a protected species. Collecting it from the wild is prohibited.
